alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Marion; Walker; Winston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 10:30AM CST until March 03 at 11:45AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Walker County in central Alabama... Southeastern Marion County in northwestern Alabama... Winston County in northwestern Alabama... Central Fayette County in west central Alabama... * Until 1145 AM CST. * At 1028 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Leighton to Gu-Win, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jasper, Haleyville, Carbon Hill, Lynn, Arley, Berry, Double Springs, Oakman, Addison, Kansas, Nauvoo, Eldridge, Curry, Houston Recreational Area, Camp McDowell, Nesmith, Ashbank, Brushy Lake, Poplar Springs and Ashridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for central, northwestern and west central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
